name: files-mcp
description: MCP server for sandboxed file access. Provides read and write operations with checksum-based safety, pattern matching, line targeting, and preset searches for Obsidian/Markdown content.

tools.name: fs_read
tools.description: Explore directories, read files, find files by name, or search content. Returns line numbers and checksums needed for editing. Supports preset patterns for Obsidian/Markdown (wikilinks, tags, tasks, headings, codeblocks, frontmatter).

tools.name: fs_write
tools.description: Create, modify, or delete files in the sandboxed filesystem. IMPORTANT: Always call fs_read first to get the checksum. Supports line-based and pattern-based targeting with dryRun preview.

FS_ROOT.title: Root Directory
FS_ROOT.description: The directory that the agent will have access to. All file operations are sandboxed within this directory.
